title: Remco Evenepoel Fuming Over ‘Head-Sock’ TT Miscue as Primož Roglič Uses it to Win
content:
Belgian media is reporting that ex-pro Michael Rogers and the UCI have 'parted ways' a day after confusion about Specialized's now-banned 'head sock.'

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel Fuming Over ‘Head-Sock’ TT Miscue as Primož Roglič Uses it to Win on Velo.
author: ahood
